Package frogger.world.levels

Class LevelRandom

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
frogger.world.World
frogger.world.levels.Level
frogger.world.levels.LevelRandom
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class LevelRandom
extends Level
LevelRandom is a class that creates a Level, with procedurally generated child nodes, for the Frogger game to use.
See Also:
Level, LevelFactory

      private static final int MIN_SPACE
      Specifies the minimum space between two child nodes. Measured in pixels.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelRandom

      protected LevelRandom​(int levelNumber, double waterBoundary)
      Creates a new instance of LevelRandom. Called by LevelFactory.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - Specifies the level number.
      waterBoundary - Specifies the y-coordinate where the water region begins in the level.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Calls generateLevel() and Level.start()
      Overrides:
      start in class Level

    • generateLevel

      private void generateLevel()
      Method for procedural generation of all child nodes. Handles logic regarding which subclass should be generated in each row. Clears any existing list of generated child nodes and replaces with new ones.

    • generateLogsInSection

      private void generateLogsInSection​(double ypos, double speed)
      Generates Log child nodes at a generated x-coordinate and specified y-coordinate.
      Parameters:
      ypos - Specifies the y-coordinate the child nodes should be generated. Measured in pixels.
      speed - Specifies the speed at which the Log instance should move at. Measured in pixels per frame.

    • generateTurtlesInSection

      private void generateTurtlesInSection​(double ypos, double speed)
      Generates Turtle child nodes at a generated x-coordinate and specified y-coordinate.
      Parameters:
      ypos - Specifies the y-coordinate the child nodes should be generated. Measured in pixels.
      speed - Specifies the speed at which the Turtle instance should move at. Measured in pixels per frame.

    • generateWetTurtlesInSection

      private void generateWetTurtlesInSection​(double ypos, double speed)
      Generates WetTurtle child nodes at a generated x-coordinate and specified y-coordinate.
      Parameters:
      ypos - Specifies the y-coordinate the child nodes should be generated. Measured in pixels.
      speed - Specifies the speed at which the WetTurtle instance should move at. Measured in pixels per frame.

    • generateTrucksInSection

      private void generateTrucksInSection​(double ypos, double speed)
      Generates Truck child nodes at a generated x-coordinate and specified y-coordinate.
      Parameters:
      ypos - Specifies the y-coordinate the child nodes should be generated. Measured in pixels.
      speed - Specifies the speed at which the Truck instance should move at. Measured in pixels per frame.

    • generateCarsInSection

      private void generateCarsInSection​(double ypos, double speed)
      Generates Car child nodes at a generated x-coordinate and specified y-coordinate.
      Parameters:
      ypos - Specifies the y-coordinate the child nodes should be generated. Measured in pixels.
      speed - Specifies the speed at which the Car instance should move at. Measured in pixels per frame.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Calls generateLevel() every time the endsFilled property of Animal is modified.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:
      propertyChange in class Level
